overview: Victoria, a student at a school specifically designed to enable young girls to marry rich men, seems ready to commit to engagement with a man worth $100 million, much to the envy of a young man who yearns for her affections, despite not being rich enough. With the help of his pretty computer-hacker girlfriend he builds an impressively wealthy but phony bio of himself in the hopes of winning Victoria's heart through money.
title: Electric Blue 35
